title: Little Busters!: EX
description: The main additions in “Little Busters! Ecstasy” are 3 heroine routes involving the characters Futaki Kanata, Sasasegawa Sasami and Tokido Saya. The episodes will be bundled with the BD/DVD releases of Little Busters!: Refrain.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Romance>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
